title: Geisladiskar til sölu, klassískt rokk mest
text:
Eftirfarandi diskar eru til sölu. Allir í frábæru ástandi, hulstrin glansa oftar en ekki. Stykkið er á 1000 kall nema keypt séu margir þá gildir magnafsláttur…
Pink Floyd - The Piper at the Gates of Dawn, A Saucerful of Secrets, Music from More, Atom Heart Mother, Meddle, Obscured by Clouds, Dark Side of the Moon, Wish You Were Here. (7000 kr)
The Doors - The Doors, Strange Days, Waiting for the Sun, The Soft Parade, Morrison Hotel, LA Woman.(5000 kr)
Kiss - Kiss, Hotter Than Hell, Dressed to Kill, Alive, Destroyer, Rock and Roll Over, Love Gun. (6000 kr)
Radiohead - Pablo Honey, The Bends, OK Computer, Kid A. (3000 kr)
The Velvet Underground - The Velvet Underground & Nico, White Light/White Heat, The Velvet Underground, Loaded, VU. (4000 kr)
The Stooges - The Stooges, Fun House, Raw Power. (2000 kr)
Tori Amos - Little Earthquakes, Under the Pink, Boys for Pele, From the Choirgirl Hotel, To Venus and Back, Scarlet's Walk. (5000 kr)
Placebo - Placebo, Without You I'm Nothing, Black Market Music. (2000 kr)
Depeche Mode - Some Great Reward, Black Celebration, Music for the Masses. (2000 kr)
